sentences.en: Sometimes he wakes up excited to work, and on other days you couldn't pry him off the couch with a forklift.
sentences.cn: 有时他一醒来就兴奋地工作，但其他日子里你用叉车都无法把他从沙发上撬下来。

sentences.en: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to pry.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我并不想刺探别人的私事。

sentences.en: Don't pry into private life of others.
sentences.cn: 不要窥探别人的私生活。
